The Tax Man Cometh: WHAT IS AN IRREVOCABLE LIFE INSURANCE TRUST (ILIT)?
Irrevocable Trust when set up properly by a NY estate lawyer can do something incredible. The Irrevocable Trust can remove estate assets from your estate thereby minimizing the estate tax liability of your heirs. This can literally save your heirs immeasurable amounts of money.
Read the rest of this article at:
